response.answer_text: Marriage was invented to make sure every guy gets a girl to spend his life with. Women are very choosy in selecting their life partner. They naturally get attracted towards men with certain qualities. In the past, before the introduction of marriage in the human society, only a few men were able to attract women and have babies with them. A major selection of men were left out. To ensure that every guy gets a girl, the institution of marriage was introduced. Also extra marital affairs were prohibited. Ideas such as chastity, virginity and monogamy were made divine. Institution of marriage is loosing its importance in the western world. The so called ‘alpha' male are dominating the dating and relationship sphere. Many men are left out and are not chosen by any female. Such men call themselves as ‘incel' ie Involuntary celibates. This has increased the misogynistic attitude among the incel men and are evident from the increasing instances of violence against women. Thus despite having many shortcomings, the institution of marriage is still functional. Monogamy is better than polygamy and unregulated sexual relationships. The Incel Movement
